inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: progressive SOB and LE edema, severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%

inclusion.criterion: ≥ 3 branches with the stenotic rate > 70% involved
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: high degree of organ insufficiency: NYHF III~IV; eGFR (MRDR) 15~ 60ml/min;
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: progressive SOB and LE edema, NYHF III

exclusion.criterion: Acute or chronic active infections including tuberculosis, hepatitis virus, etc.;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other autoimmune diseases including systemic lupus erythematosus, Behcet disease, IgG4 relative disease;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: successive twice relapse occurs even after the intervention adjustment ( for the benefits of patients);
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Kerr score, blood pressure, and stenotic rate are unknown. Severe organ insufficiency is a concern.
